query:
SELECT 
  'frameworks' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM frameworks
UNION ALL
SELECT 'controls', COUNT(*) FROM controls
UNION ALL
SELECT 'articles', COUNT(*) FROM articles
UNION ALL
SELECT 'users', COUNT(*) FROM users
UNION ALL
SELECT 'notifications', COUNT(*) FROM notifications;
